amendment.description: To prohibit any Federal funding for the Wuhan Institute of Virology.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1507 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1507 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 1502. (consideration: CR S3409; text: CR S3402) To prohibit any Federal funding for the Wuhan Institute of Virology.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1507 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1507 proposed by Senator Cantwell for Senator Ernst to Amendment SA 1502.
